definitions.definition:
Not coherent.
Not making logical sense; not logically connected or consistent.

parsedExamples.example: When we confronted her, she gave us a hasty, incoherent explanation.
After just a few drinks, he becomes incoherent.

examples: When we confronted her, she gave us a hasty, incoherent explanation.
After just a few drinks, he becomes incoherent.
